verbs.description: Many [V: have] been outraged with US attorney - general Jeff Sessions using the Bible to justify the Trump government ’s policy towards illegal immigrants . This policy includes separating parents and children at the border as a form of deterrence to border crossings . Sessions alludes to Romans 13:1 - 7 , which he calls the Apostle Paul ’s “ clear and wise command , ” which …
